name: -webkit-box-reflect
description: Defines a reflection of a border box.
longDescription: Reflections will update automatically as the source changes. Specifying a reflection has the effect of creating a stacking context (like opacity, masks, and transforms). The reflection is non-interactive, and as such, it has no effect on hit testing. The reflection has no effect on layout, other than being part of a containerâ€™s overflow; it is similar to -webkit-box-shadow in this respect.

<direction>.description: The position of the reflection relative to the border box.

values.above: The reflection appears above the border box.
values.below: The reflection appears below the border box.
values.left: The reflection appears to the left of the border box.
values.right: The reflection appears to the right of the border box.

<offset>.description: The distance of the reflection from the edge of the border box, in length units or as a percentage.

<mask-box-image>.description: Used to overlay the reflection. If omitted, the reflection has no mask.
